name: wdio-tests-telnyx
description: Automated WDIO E2E tests for Telnyx

scripts.test: cross-env BROWSER=chrome VIEWPORT=base npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.js
scripts.test:chrome: cross-env BROWSER=chrome VIEWPORT=desktop npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.js
scripts.test:firefox: cross-env BROWSER=firefox VIEWPORT=desktop npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.js
scripts.test:mobile:chrome: cross-env BROWSER=chrome VIEWPORT=mobile npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.js
scripts.test:mobile:firefox: cross-env BROWSER=firefox VIEWPORT=mobile npx wdio run ./wdio.conf.js
